member_organisations: IZA-Europe has as sole member the international zinc association (IZA)
fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
ETS 
REACH, CLP, Cosmetics Regulation, Food Contact Material and implementation of 'nano' notion in all EU regulations. 
Water Framework Directive.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
IZA-Europe is a member of Eurometaux, the voice of the non-ferrous metals industry. 
IZA-Europe is a member of ECCA (European coil coating association) 
IZA-Europe is a member of MfB (metals for Buildings) 
IZA-Europe is a affiliate member CEPMC (Council of European Producers of Materials for Construction)
goals__remit:
IZA Europe is an association representing Europe’s leading mining companies, zinc smelters and semi-fabricators . 
IZA Europe activities are restricted to environmental, health and safety aspects related to mining, refining, processing and use of zinc and some compounds.
